FuncDef: The display adaptive-routing configuration status command displays the configuration delivery status of adaptive routing. The display adaptive-routing configuration status command displays the configuration delivery status of adaptive routing. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
